last_episode_to_air.name: Quake
last_episode_to_air.overview:
Quake and Iron Man Team Up!

Quake works undercover as the ruthless villain, Crumble, in order to take down Taskmaster. However, when Quake finds out the mission takes her into the house of Tony Stark, she’ll need to think on her feet so she doesn’t get a face full of repulsor or expose her identity.

name: Marvel Rising: Initiation
overview: Gwen Stacy AKA Ghost-Spider, wrongly accused of a crime she didn’t commit, seeks to clear her name and deliver justice. Unfortunately, her dad is not only Captain of the NYPD, but spearheading the manhunt! To make matters worse, other young heroes—Ms. Marvel, Squirrel Girl, Quake and Patriot—are after Ghost Spider as well. But, as the chase to uncover the truth winds down, a darker threat looms along the horizon, and very soon, these heroes will need to put aside their differences and work together as a team.

seasons.name: Season 1 - Initiation
seasons.overview: Teenage superhero Gwen Stacy, a.k.a. Ghost-Spider, is used to spending her time fighting for justice and playing drums in her band. But when she finds herself accused of being on the wrong side of the law — chased by her police captain father, as well as a host of young heroes including Ms. Marvel, Squirrel Girl, Quake and Patriot — Ghost-Spider must go on the run to prove her innocence.

seasons.name: Season 2 - Ultimate Comic
seasons.overview: Marvel Rising: Ultimate Comic is a Marvel HQ YouTube web series of motion comic shorts combining comic-style graphic paneling with digitally-animated motion effects. Each episode focuses on one of the main Marvel Rising characters with special appearances by Thor, Loki, Doctor Strange, Captain America, Iron Man, Hawkeye, and Hulk.

episodes.name: Mission: Ghost Hunter
episodes.overview: While pursuing the criminal responsible for her best friend's death, Ghost-Spider is mistakenly accused of the crime by both SHIELD and the NYPD.

episodes.name: Floor Toms Spider Webs
episodes.overview: As Ghost-Spider deals with the loss of her friend, she continues hunting for the culprit while also trying to keep up appearances with her friends and bandmates.

episodes.name: BFHF
episodes.overview: Best friends, Ms. Marvel and Squirrel Girl, join forces to apprehend an alleged super-hero-turned-vigilante: Ghost-Spider!

episodes.name: Two On One
episodes.overview: Finally confronting Ghost-Spider, Squirrel Girl and Ms. Marvel discover that there's more to this 'villain' than meets the eye.

episodes.name: The Stories They Tell
episodes.overview: Ghost-Spider finally gets the chance to tell her side of the story when she's captured by Squirrel Girl and Ms. Marvel.

episodes.name: The Secrets We Keep
episodes.overview: Ghost-Spider's run from the law finally ends when she's caught by SHIELD agents Patriot and Quake, but everything changes when her true identity is revealed.

1.name: Season 1 - Initiation
1.overview: Teenage superhero Gwen Stacy, a.k.a. Ghost-Spider, is used to spending her time fighting for justice and playing drums in her band. But when she finds herself accused of being on the wrong side of the law — chased by her police captain father, as well as a host of young heroes including Ms. Marvel, Squirrel Girl, Quake and Patriot — Ghost-Spider must go on the run to prove her innocence.

episodes.name: Ms. Marvel
episodes.overview:
Ms. Marvel Faces Off Against Loki!

Ms. Marvel's class trip gets derailed by a mischievous Asgardian who's trying to steal a fancy mystical Asgardian glove on display at the museum!

episodes.name: Patriot
episodes.overview:
Patriot Trains with Hawkeye!

Patriot trains with Hawkeye and Blur, before facing off against some real life villains and learns the importance of working together.

episodes.name: Squirrel Girl
episodes.overview:
Squirrel Girl Teams Up With Doctor Strange!

The Unbeatable Squirrel Girl joins the Sorcerer Supreme, Doctor Strange, by using her awesome knowledge of all things squirrel and computer science to fight Ulth-Lah-Throth, the devourer!

episodes.name: America Chavez
episodes.overview:
Cap and America Chavez!

When America Chavez's motorcycle ride is interrupted by Attuma and a giant sea monster, she joins forces with Captain America to save the city from a watery doom!

episodes.name: Inferno
episodes.overview:
Inferno and Hulk Confront Monstrosity!

Inferno just wants to be accepted, but his friends and parents don't understand his powers. When a confrontation with Abomination leads him to team up with Hulk, Inferno realizes that no matter who may fear him, he's not a monster.

episodes.name: Quake
episodes.overview:
